name: BOG Bubble
description: BOG Bubble is an indica-dominant hybrid bred by B.O.G. Seeds. These frosty, sticky buds offer a sweet, bubblegum aroma and deliver long-lasting, uplifting effects. Grows are successful indoor or outdoor, flowering between 45 and 50 days.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Relaxed, Creative, Hungry, Insomnia, Stress, Depression, Pain, Cramps, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
